data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are several ways that people can help charities through donations. First of all, I think that kind people can donate money to charities so the organization will have enough funds to help poor children and homelessness. Besides, donating some clothes and sneakers is also a good idea to help charities. For example, I have donated two jackets to a nearby charity so some poor children can probably feel warm with the help of my jacket. Finally, I believe that probably we can also donate books to charity because many novels are indeed expensive. By reading some novels, poor children and homelessness are more likely to get spiritual power and try their best to pursue a better life.
data.referenceText: What kinds of donations can people make to help charities?
data.referenceTranslate: 人们可以通过什么样的捐赠来帮助慈善机构？
